version_description: Welcome to Piano Academy!

This release adds some new features like:
- Your performances are now rated with stars, so go back if needed to make sure you get three stars.
- We added titles to all songs.
- We added a progress bar to videos and songs.

Other than that, we improved our note detection and fixed some bugs.
Be sure that we are working hard to add more lessons very soon so stay tuned.
Also, we really appreciate the amazing responses we get from all of you.
Thank you!

This release includes some bug fixes and experience improvements:
- We made the on-screen touch keyboard a bit bigger.
- We now highlight keys in some songs to hint relevant keys.
- We adjusted the size of the staff on iPad devices.
- We fixed some design issues on devices set to Right to Left languages.

New lessons are coming real soon. Thanks again for your reviews and don’t forget to recommend Piano Academy to your friends and family while gathering around the holiday table. Happy holidays!

Good news! We have new lessons for all of you, piano lovers. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements:
- We added new lessons 13-17 (lessons 18-22 are just around the corner.)
- You can now test your knowledge once in a while with our Trivia game.
- We added notifications. Make sure you allow it, so you'll be notified first on new songs and features.

Thank you for using Piano Academy!
Thank you for using Piano Academy! This release contains bug fixes and stability improvements.

Thank you for using Piano Academy! Here’s what’s new:
- We added new lessons 18-22, so you can now move on and learn to play chords.
- The Songbook is finally here. Practice playing your favorite songs whenever you want.
- We also fixed some bugs and improved performance.
- Bug fixes and performance improvement

Thank you for using Piano Academy! Here’s what’s new:
- You can now pause and resume playing.
- We also fixed some bugs.

Don’t forget to like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/YokeePianoAcademy/

- We added more great songs to our Songbook.
- We fixed some bugs.

Piano Academy is the fastest way to learn to play the piano. Here’s what’s new:
- We added new amazing lessons (33-43).
- We also added more great songs to our Songbook.
- We now support new languages: Japanese, Chinese, Spanish & French.
- We've fixed some bug to provide you with a better experience.

Don’t forget to like us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/YokeePianoAcademy/

Piano Academy is the coolest way to learn to play the piano. Here’s what’s new:
- You can now change the language of subtitles.
- Listen to a preview of songs in our Songbook.
- We also fixed some bugs and improved performance.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- We added more great songs to our Songbook.

- The holidays are here! We added some great holiday songs for you to practice with.

Thank you for using Piano Academy. We wish you all HAPPY HOLIDAYS!

- The holidays are here! We added some great holiday songs for you to practice with. Enjoy!
- You can now control the way notes appear on the staff.
- We also fixed some bugs.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Thank you for using Piano Academy. We wish you all a happy new year!

- We enhanced the design of lessons and tasks.
- You can now change the background color of the staff view.
- We improved our support for Japanese.
- We fixed issues related to MIDI connection.
- We fixed some bugs.

Love Piano Academy? Please rate us!
